Uses of Package
plugins.adufour.ezplug

Classes in plugins.adufour.ezplug used by plugins.adufour.ezplug
EzComponent
          Abstract class defining a component of an EzPlug and its behavior in the graphical user interface.
EzException
          Convenience class for the EzPlug framework that allows to raise exceptions occurring within the EzPlug layer to optimize bug finding / reporting / fixing.
EzGroup
          Class defining a group of EzComponents, which will appear in the interface within a titled box.
EzGUI
          Graphical interface generator for the EzPlug framework.
When instantiated, each EzPlug creates an EzGUI to allow developers to add graphical components in a fast and intuitive manner, allowing to build rich interfaces with advanced user interaction without any knowledge in graphical interface programming.
EzMessage.MessageType
          Enumerates the different types of messages which may be sent
EzMessage.OutputType
          Enumerates the different ways to output the message
EzVar
          Class defining a variable for use within an EzPlug.

EzVar objects are powerful components that bind each parameter type to a specific graphical component that can be used to receive input from the user interface.
EzVar.Storable
          Interface allowing variables to be saved and loaded from disk
EzVarFile
          Class defining a variable of type String, embarking a button triggering a file dialog as graphical component
EzVarListener
          Interface used to fire events occurring on variables
EzVarNumeric
          Superclass of all variables holding a number-type variable.
EzVarNumericArray
          Abstract class defining a "numeric array"-type variable, representing arrays of numeric values that the user may choose from or input its own using the variable's parsing abilities
